amendment.description: To provide for temporary suspension of OASIS requirement for collection of data on non-medicare and non-medicaid patients.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1017 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1017 proposed by Senator Allard. (consideration: CR S8608-8609, S8681; text: CR S8608) To provide for temporary suspension of OASIS requirement for collection of data on non-medicare and non-medicaid patients.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1017 proposed by Senator Allard.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1017 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
